contents:
Well, as you said, you've spent time on perfecting English, so I write this in English.

When you advance on your path, there are always people you have to left behind.

Maybe it is painful, or joyful, but the fact is that they will NOT accompany you, no matter what.

Here comes your choice: embrace yourself, or them. Which one is more important? According to whose or what kind of moral standard?

Your call.

Whatever it is, your only option now is go independent.
